title: Portal - Snap Bonus
description: Jennifer Percy was just a young graduate student researching PTSD, but the closer she got to understanding the inner workings of one soldier’s trauma, the more she lost her own footing in reality.
itunes:title: Portal - Snap Bonus
itunes:subtitle: Jennifer Percy was just a young graduate student researching PTSD, but the closer she got to understanding the inner workings of one soldier’s trauma, the more she lost her own footing in reality. For more, check out her book: Demon Camp. Producer: Nancy
author: stats@snapjudgment.org (Snap Judgment)
